channel.title: Please Help! Demethium 639 ItemDefEditor error
channel.description:
Well, I get an error with my ItemDefEditor, I have a .bat that runs it and have even tried using Eclipse to see if it would work, no luck, I got the same error. The ShopEditor, DropEditor, Etc, all work fine, but this one does not. I tried downloading completely new sources to make sure I didn't mess anything up, and I still got the same error. I've been searching all night and found similair things, but not quite any help that would get me to solve this.
[code=java]Loading cache... Loaded cache! Loading item definitions... Loaded 20430 item definitions. Loading range weapon info... Loaded 186 range weapon definitions. Loading range ammunition info... >> Please help me on this!! Im new to 639's but ive coded 317's and 508's soo i just need some help with 639's :D It would be so awsome if anyone could help me with this!!<<

item.title: Please Help! Demethium 639 ItemDefEditor error
item.dc:creator: @Darrenrulez Darrenrulez
item.description:
@Darrenrulez wrote:

I use dementhium 637 and never recieved this error , but make sure your environmental variables are set correctly , right click Itemdefeditor.bat and choose edit, your code should look exactly like this :
@echo off
title ItemDefEditor
“C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.6.0_27/bin/java” -server -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/* org.dementhium.tools.ItemDefEditor
pause

Feel Free To Copy And Paste

Let me know if that works , if not I’ll try help you more :]
.

Read full topic
